# TASK::IS_PED_BEING_ARRESTED

## Summary
Determines whether the specified ped is currently being arrested

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This function is hard-coded to always return 0.
